title: day02-用户管理模块
content:
用户管理模块

查询

Title:条件查询
移动端->UserController:1.searchUserByPage
UserController->UserService:2.searchUserByPage
UserService->TbUserDao:3.searchUserByPage
TbUserDao-->UserService:4.ArrayList

UserService->TbUserDao:5.searchUserCount
TbUserDao-->UserService:6.long
UserService-->UserController:7.PageUtils
UserController-->移动端:8.R

前端：

user.vue:

template:

:data="dataList" 				绑定数据集合
:model="dataForm"				查询条件集合
v-model="dataForm.name"			查询条件集合中的name
v-model="dataForm.sex"			查询条件集合中的sex
v-model="dataForm.role"			查询条件集合中的role
v-model="dataForm.deptId"		查询条件集合中的deptId
v-model="dataForm.status"		查询条件集合中的status
:page-sizes="[10, 20, 50]" :page-size="pageSize" :total="totalCount"
								分页条件：当前页号，记录总数

script:

searchHandle: function() {
	this.$refs['dataForm'].validate(valid => {
		if (valid) {	
			this.$refs['dataForm'].clearValidate();
			if (this.dataForm.name == '') {
				this.dataForm.name = null;
			}
			if (this.pageIndex != 1) {
				this.pageIndex = 1;
			}
			this.loadDataLiat();
		} else {
			return false;
	});
},
loadDataLiat: function() {
	let that = this;
	that.dataListLoading = true;
	let data = {
		page: that.pageIndex,
		length: that.pageSize,
		name: that.dataForm.name,
		sex: that.dataForm.sex,
		role: that.dataForm.role,
		deptId: that.dataForm.deptId,
		status: that.dataForm.status
	};
	//
	that.$http('user/searchUserByPage', 'POST', data, true, function(resp) {
		let page = resp.page;
		let list = page.list;
		for (let one in list) {
			if (one.status == 1) {
				one.status = '在职';
			} else if (one.status == 2) {
				one.status = '离职';
			}
		}
		that.dataList = list;
		that.totalCount = page.totalCount;
		that.dataListLoading = false;
	})
}

后端：

DAO:

TbUserDao:

public ArrayList<HashMap> searchUserByPage(HashMap param);

public long searchUserCount(HashMap param);

TbUserDao.xml:

<select id="searchUserByPage" parameterType="HashMap" resultType="HashMap">
  SELECT DISTINCT u.id,
                  u.name,
                  u.sex,
                  u.tel,
                  u.email,
                  d.dept_name as dept,
                  u.hiredate,
                  u.root,
                  u.status,
                  (
                      SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(role_name separator "，")
                      FROM tb_role
                      WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(u.role,CONVERT (id,CHAR ))
                  ) as roles
  FROM tb_user u
  JOIN tb_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role,CONVERT (r.id,CHAR ))
  LEFT JOIN tb_dept d ON u.dept_id=d.id
  <where>
    <if test="name!=null">
      u.name LIKE '%${name}%'
    </if>
    <if test="sex!=null">
      AND u.sex = #{sex}
    </if>
    <if test="role!=null">
      AND r.role_name = #{role}
    </if>
    <if test="deptId!=null">
      AND d.id = #{deptId}
    </if>
    <if test="status!=null">
      AND u.status = #{status}
    </if>
  </where>
  LIMIT #{start},#{length}
</select>
<select id="searchUserCount" parameterType="HashMap" resultType="long">
  SELECT count(DISTINCT u.id)
  FROM tb_user u
  JOIN tb_role r ON  JSON_CONTAINS(u.role,CONVERT (r.id,CHAR ))
  <where>
    <if test="name!=null">
      u.name LIKE '%${name}%'
    </if>
    <if test="sex!=null">
      AND u.sex = #{sex}
    </if>
    <if test="role!=null">
      AND r.role_name = #{role}
    </if>
    <if test="deptId!=null">
      AND u.dept_id = #{deptId}
    </if>
    <if test="status!=null">
      AND u.status = #{status}
    </if>
  </where>
</select>

Service：

UserService:

public PageUtils searchUserByPage(HashMap param);

public long searchUserCount(HashMap param);

UserServiceImpl:

@Override
public PageUtils searchUserByPage(HashMap param) {
    ArrayList<HashMap> list = userDao.searchUserByPage(param);
    Integer start = (Integer) param.get("start");
    Integer length = (Integer) param.get("length");
    long count = userDao.searchUserCount(param);
    return new PageUtils(list, count, start, length);
}

@Override
public long searchUserCount(HashMap param) {
    return userDao.searchUserCount(param);
}

Controller:

SearchUserByPageForm:

@Data
@Schema(description = "查询用户分页记录表单")
public class SearchUserByPageForm {
    @NotNull(message = "page不能为空")
    @Min(value = 1,message = "页数不能小于1")
    @Schema(description = "页数")
    private Integer page;

    @NotNull(message = "length不能为空")
    @Range(min = 10,max = 50,message = "length必须在10-50之间")
    @Schema(description = "每页记录数")
    private Integer length;

    @Pattern(regexp = "^[\\u4e00-\\u9fa5]{1,10}$",message = "name内容不正确")
    @Schema(description = "姓名")
    private String name;

    @Pattern(regexp = "^[a-zA-Z0-9\\u4e00-\\u9fa5]{2,10}$",message = "role内容不正确")
    @Schema(description = "角色")
    private String role;

    @Pattern(regexp = "^男$|^女$",message = "sex内容不正确")
    @Schema(description = "性别")
    private String sex;

    @Min(value = 1,message = "dept不能小于1")
    @Schema(description = "部门")
    private Integer deptId;

    @Min(value = 1,message = "status不能小于1")
    @Schema(description = "状态")
    private Integer status;
}

UserController:

@PostMapping("/searchUserByPage")
@Operation(summary = "分页查询")
@SaCheckPermission(value = {"ROOT", "USER:SELECT"}, mode = SaMode.OR)
public R searchUserByPage(@Valid @RequestBody SearchUserByPageForm form){
   int page= form.getPage();
   int length=form.getLength();
   int start=(page-1)*length;
   HashMap map = JSONUtil.parse(form).toBean(HashMap.class);
   map.put("start",start);
   PageUtils pageUtils = userService.searchUserByPage(map);
   return R.ok().put("page",pageUtils);
}
